name: Manali
description: A picturesque hill station in Himachal Pradesh known for its scenic beauty, adventure activities, and vibrant culture.

name: Kasol
description: A serene village nestled in the Parvati Valley, popular among backpackers and nature lovers for its stunning landscapes and peaceful atmosphere.

name: Spiti
description: A high-altitude desert valley located in Himachal Pradesh, known for its breathtaking scenery, ancient monasteries, and unique cultural heritage.
